name: Thalassic cleanup
description:
After 20 years You comeback to old facility, that you used to work at.

But why did you comeback? You hated this job. Did They offered you that much, that you changed your mind? Did you wanted to see that place just one more time? Or is there something else?

A submission to HPS1 Summer Of Shivers, and also my first public game. I learned a lot while making it, so hopefully my next title will be much better :)
